help.passwordRecovery.title: Password Recovery
help.passwordRecovery.overview.title: Overview
help.passwordRecovery.overview.descripti: BonsCompte provides a secure password recovery system through trusted users. If you forget your password, people you've designated as trusted users can help you regain access to your account.
help.passwordRecovery.twoLayer.title: Recovery Methods
help.passwordRecovery.twoLayer.systemAdm: A system administrator with server access can reset any user's password using the command line tool:
This generates a temporary password that must be changed on first login.
help.passwordRecovery.twoLayer.projectMe: If you've set up trusted users in your account settings, they can collectively approve your password recovery request. This method doesn't require administrator involvement.
You need at least 2 trusted users configured for recovery to be available
At least 2 of your trusted users must approve the recovery request
Recovery requests expire after 30 minutes if not approved
help.passwordRecovery.workflow.title: Recovery Workflow
help.passwordRecovery.workflow.step1.des: On the login page, click "Forgot password?" and enter your username to start the recovery process.
help.passwordRecovery.workflow.step2.des: Contact your trusted users through another channel (phone, email, in person) and ask them to approve your recovery request in BonsCompte.
help.passwordRecovery.workflow.step3.des: Your trusted users log into BonsCompte and approve your recovery request from their notifications or the Approvals page.
help.passwordRecovery.workflow.step4.des: Once enough trusted users have approved, you'll be able to set a new password and regain access to your account.
help.passwordRecovery.whyApproval.title: Why Trusted Users?
help.passwordRecovery.whyApproval.descri: The trusted users system provides security while avoiding email-based recovery:
help.passwordRecovery.whyApproval.reason: No email required - BonsCompte doesn't store your email address
Human verification - trusted users can confirm your identity through other means
Distributed trust - no single person can take over your account
help.passwordRecovery.important.title: Important Notes
help.passwordRecovery.important.point1: Set up trusted users BEFORE you need them - you can do this in Settings
help.passwordRecovery.important.point2: Choose trusted users you can contact through other means (phone, in person)
help.passwordRecovery.important.point3: If you have no trusted users, only a system administrator can help you recover your account
help.passwordRecovery.contactAdmin.title: Need Help?
help.passwordRecovery.contactAdmin.descr: If you don't have trusted users set up or they're unavailable, contact the person who manages your BonsCompte server for assistance.
